name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Days until Twitch Prime on Sub Button

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This will change the text in the subscribe button on Twitch to instead show the number of days remaining until your Twitch Primeâ€¦

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This will change the text in the subscribe button on Twitch to instead show the number of days remaining until your Twitch Prime sub is available.
